name: l1ght
description:
A game created for the GMTK Game Jam, but saddly i couldn´t upload in time. But here it is, the theme was "Only One" and i make it around only one controller input, and a "mini-story" that follows only one structure and iterates itself.

This is my first entrie for a jam, and my very first game that isn´t a clone of something else, i don´t think this is original or innovative, but i feel proud of it, and probably i will extend and develope it further to make a finished game. Enjoy <3

PD: i suck at time space between dialogues xd.
